question:
Calculate the percentage of the cards availabe in Chinese Simplified.
Chinese Simplified' is the language; percentage = Divide(Sum(id where language = 'Chinese Simplified'), Count(id)) *100
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.language = 'Chinese Simplified' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(T1.id), 0) FROM cards AS T1 INNER JOIN foreign_data AS T2 ON T1.uuid = T2.uuid
